channel.title: Israel news
channel.description: Israel news, all the latest and breaking from telegraph.co.uk including the conflict from the Gaza strip

item.title: Why does the British Royal Family visit Saudi Arabia but not Israel?
item.description: Members of the Royal family regularly visit authoritarian Arab states, but they have not made an official trip to Israel since the country was founded
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Hanukkah 2015: What is the Jewish Festival of Lights and when does it begin?
item.description: Doughnuts, dreidels and a nine-branched candle holder. Here's all you need to know about Hanukkah, the Jewish Festival of Lights
item.author: Cameron Macphail

item.title: When is Hanukkah 2015? The Jewish Festival of Lights begins at what time?
item.description: Doughnuts, dreidels and a nine-branched candle holder. Here's all you need to know about Hanukkah, the Jewish Festival of Lights
item.author: Cameron Macphail

item.title: Israel arrests suspected Jewish extremists for murder of Palestinian family
item.description: The arrests mark progress in the murders of 18-month-old Ali Dawabsheh and his parents, a case which has long been a source of fury for Palestinians
item.author: Agency

item.title: Holocaust survivor reunited after 70 years with Polish 'big sister' who saved him from Nazis
item.description: Michael Hochberg, 77, had an emotional reuinion with 86-year-old Krystyna Jakubowska at New York's JFK airport
item.author: Helena Horton

item.title: Israel razes home of man allegedly behind settler killing, army says
item.description: Rajeb Aliua, an alleged member of militant Hamas movement, is accused of overseeing behind the deaths of Naama and Eitam Henkin, shot in front of their children
item.author: AFP

item.title: The Boycott Israel movement is driven by bigotry
item.description: BDS bullies want everyone in Christendome to refuse to have anything to do with Israeli, bu they are an ugly, vindictive movement
item.author: Brendan O'Neill

item.title: Horrific new details emerge about the 1972 Munich Olympics massacre
item.description: Israeli athletes were beaten until their bones snapped and one man was castrated by Palestinian terrorists
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Retired Cambridge academic refuses to help Israeli girl with school project 'until there is peace in Palestine'
item.description: Dr Marsha Levine, an expert in horse domestication, told the 13-year-old that she would not answer her questions because she boycotts Israel
item.author: Camilla Turner

item.title: How Israel confronts Islamic State
item.description: Israel has grappled with terrorism for decades and may have lessons for the West as it moves against alleged jihadists within its own borders
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Two Israelis convicted of murdering Palestinian teenager Muhammad Abu Khdeir
item.description: Palestinians furious as court delays the verdict for the group's alleged mastermind, who claims to be insane
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Two Jewish men 'convicted of murdering Palestinian teenager Abu Khudair'
item.description: The two had confessed to abducting, bludgeoning and burning Khudair in a revenge killing for the deaths of three Israeli youths by Hamas militants
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Paris attacks and Brussels raids prompt Belgium's Jews to consider new exodus
item.description: In the wake of a series of terrorist attacks, some of Belgium's 45,000 Jews are now considering leaving
item.author: Matthew Holehouse

item.title: Israel freezes the EU out of peace talks with the Palestinians
item.description: Benjamin Netanyahu announces move in retaliation for EU decision to label products made in Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Palestinian teenager killed by Israeli forces after stabbing in Jerusalem
item.description: The 16-year-old stabbed a Palestinian man, whom she mistook for an Israeli, while a passerby was also injured by a ricocheting bullet
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Hamas to pay officials with former Israeli settlement land
item.description: Hamas announces that it intends to compensate civil servants with portions of land formerly occupied by Israeli settlers instead of paying long-delayed salaries
item.author: Telegraph Staff

item.title: Israeli spy Jonathan Pollard released from American prison after 30 years
item.description: Israeli spy freed from North Carolina prison after 30 years; lawyers call parole conditions "onerous and oppressive"
item.author: Harriet Alexander

item.title: Five killed in attacks in Tel Aviv and Israeli settlement in West Bank
item.description: Israel sees one of its bloodiest days since lateset round of violence began in October
item.author: Raf Sanchez

item.title: Convicted spy Jonathan Pollard hopes to emigrate to Israel upon release from prison
item.description: American conviced of spying for Isreal will be released on Friday after 30 years in prison
item.author: David Lawler

item.title: Israeli government falls for fake Jeremy Corbyn advisor Twitter account
item.description: The mistake highlights Israel's deep suspicions about the Labour leader and his positions on the Middle East
item.author: Raf Sanchez
